data.text: Wɛlɛ, gi-ɠɔɠɔiti ti loga ɗa-ziɠidaʋɛti, ee, Zeluzalɛme!
Zeluzalɛme, taa wolai togai ga pagɔ,
Miná ɠa bolodamaiti ta ɗa ʋa ná, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-bolodaiti,
Náʋɛ ɠa masa kpɔkpɔgiti ti ná, Davide mavofodai ʋɛ,
À GALA fali ga Zeluzalɛme ziilɛigi zɔlɔɔ, wo ɠɛ ma:
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ada-ƓALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi ná-fai maaʋele ma,
